#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char a[111111];
    scanf("%s", a);
    int mx = 0, i, cnt;
    char c;
    for (i = 0; a[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        cnt = 1;
        while (a[i] == a[i+1]) {
            cnt++;
            i++;
        }
        if (cnt > mx) {
            mx = cnt;
            c = a[i];
        }
        else if (cnt == mx && a[i] < c)
            c = a[i];
    }
    printf("%c\n%d\n", c, mx);
    return 0;
}
